column3: Always include the country code with the mobile numbers to ensure proper formatting, also  Verify that the number of digits in the mobile number aligns with the standards for the respective country.
Before using custom attributes in your CSV, ensure they are added to the custom field settings in the platform.
The country code can be provided in any standard format, such as +91 or 91. Both are acceptable.
If no country code is specified for a mobile number, the system will automatically assign the default country code, 91 (India).
